hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WORKQUEUE_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Override workqueue version in deploy script: format "@0.8.1pre1" etc. Blank for current deploy version.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh
# stop couchdb if [ -e $PWD/current ]; then echo "Stopping services" $PWD/current/config/couchdb/manage stop 'I did read documentation'
# stop frontend (. $PWD/current/apps/frontend/etc/profile.d/init.sh && httpd -f $PWD/state/frontend/server.conf -k stop) fi
rm -rf install current # remove old cronjobs crontab -r || true # dont die if no old crontab

set +x
rm -rf install
# make workqueue deploy work in single user mode #patch -N -d cfg -p2 < /var/lib/jenkins/workqueue_sudo.patch
# skip sudo usage - just adds to /etc etc. perl -p -i -e 's/.*sudo.*//' $PWD/cfg/frontend/deploy
# link to hostcert mkdir -p certs [ -e certs/hostcert.pem ] || $(ln -s /etc/grid-security/hostcert.pem certs/hostcert.pem) [ -e certs/hostkey.pem ] || $(ln -s /etc/grid-security/hostkey.pem certs/hostkey.pem)
# note single user install # need couchdb to get couchdb manage commands $PWD/cfg/Deploy -p $HOME/auth -t install -r comp=comp.pre -A slc5_amd64_gcc434 -s 'prep sw post' $PWD admin frontend backend couchdb workqueue${WMAGENT_VERSION}
# standard deploy assumes running as root - need to change few things HTTPD_CONF=$PWD/state/frontend/server.conf
# run under current user perl -p -i -e 's/^User/#User/' ${HTTPD_CONF} perl -p -i -e 's/^Group/#Group/' ${HTTPD_CONF}
# non-privileged port perl -p -i -e 's/Listen 80/Listen 8080/' ${HTTPD_CONF} perl -p -i -e 's/\*:80/\*:8080/' ${HTTPD_CONF}
perl -p -i -e 's/Listen 443/Listen 8443/' ${HTTPD_CONF} perl -p -i -e 's/\*:443/\*:8443/' ${HTTPD_CONF}
# add test agent cert credentials cat extra-certificates.txt >> current/config/frontend/extra-certificates.txt ./sitedb-mapping.sh sitedb-mapping.txt current/auth/frontend/users.db
# FIXME: Remove when updated beyond 0.8.8 perl -p -i -e 's!domain=self.getDomainName\(\)!domain=""!' current/apps/workqueue/lib/python2.6/site-packages/WMCore/Services/Requests.py
# couchdb on 8443 perl -p -i -e 's!https://%s/couchdb!https://%s:8443/couchdb!' current/config/workqueue/GlobalWorkQueueConfig.py perl -p -i -e 's!https://%s/reqmgr/reqMgr" % HOST!https://dev-cms-reqmgr.cern.ch:8443/reqmgr/reqMgr"!' current/config/workqueue/GlobalWorkQueueConfig.py
# divorce processes so they dont get killed # https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/ProcessTreeKiller
# start couchdb BUILD_ID=dontKillMe current/config/couchdb/manage start 'I did read documentation'
#start frontend (manage assumes root so cant be used) (. current/apps/frontend/etc/profile.d/init.sh && BUILD_ID=dontKillMe httpd -f $PWD/state/frontend/server.conf -k start)
